page.title: 14HOME LIFE.
page.content: {A Day in My Life. I wake up at 7:25 am and get up at 7:45.After I have washed and dressed I see to my chores.Then I have breakfast,Cornflakes or Shreddies,and toast.School starts at 9:00 and finishes at 3:30.First we have assembly followed by Maths and English,later we have our dinner. In the afternoon we have Art and Craft.One day a week we go swimming. In the evening I have my tea at 6:00 and watch TV.I often do hobbies.I go to aerobics-exercising to pop music-at Priory Street.I attend a drama class at Scarcroft School,which is great fun.At other times I have a tennis class,again at Priory Street,and I am a girl guide. Bedtime is about 9:00 pm.Sometimes I wish it was later because I would like to see some later TV programmes.
